name: Indoor Crowd Management System
desc: This project creates a real-time Crowd Management System for accurate crowd counting, density monitoring, and color-coded alerts to enhance public safety.

name: TKC Website
desc: TechBairn's student community website connects students with resources, and events to support skill development and career growth in the tech field.

name: GlamBot
desc: GlamBot - Conversational Outfit Generator Powered by GenAI

name: Weather Application
desc: A weather application providing real-time forecasts, alerts, and detailed weather insights to help users stay prepared for any conditions.

name: Jobbly
desc: Jobbly is an API that uses OpenAI's LLM to provide job seekers with personalized recommendations to help them make informed career decisions.

name: Word Letter Counter
desc: A word and letter counter tool that quickly calculates the number of words, characters, and spaces in any text for efficient content analysis.
